instruction: Read the passage and categorize it by genre.
input: The movie was thrilling, with high-speed car chases, explosions, and action-packed fight scenes.
output: The genre of the passage is Action.

instruction: Generate a tutorial on how to make a paper plane
output: To make a paper plane, start by folding the top corners of a rectangular piece of paper so they meet in the middle. Then, fold the paper in half lengthwise. Next, fold the corners of the folded paper inwards until they touch the center crease. After that, unfold the paper, and fold the top corners of the paper towards the center. Finally, fold the paper in half, and then make two small folds on the wings to give them a curved shape. Now your paper plane is ready to be flown!

instruction: Generate a list of advantages and disadvantages of using electric cars
output:
Advantages: 
- Electric cars produce no emissions, which means they are better for the environment 
- Electric cars are cheaper to run and maintain than traditional cars
- They are quieter and more comfortable to drive 

Disadvantages: 
- The initial cost of the car might be higher than shouldering the cost of a traditional car
- Charging times can be significantly longer than refueling times 
- The charging infrastructure for electric cars may be limited in some places

instruction: Generate a list of criteria to assess a research paper
output:
- Quality of the research design 
- The quality and relevance of collected data 
- Clarity and consistency of the paper 
- Appropriateness of choice of methods 
- Accuracy of claim and argumentation 
- Depth and breadth of literature review 
- Quality of the discussion
- Relevance of conclusion 
- Relevance of implications 
- Professionalism of the presentation 
- Quality of the bibliographic data

instruction: Generate a fun and creative way to spend a day
output: Have a picnic in the park! Pack a lunch, bring some blankets and games, and have a great time with your friends and family. Spend the day outdoors, socializing, eating delicious food, and playing fun games. You can even play catch or set up a scavenger hunt! Enjoy the sunshine and fresh air and take in the sights and sounds of nature. Make sure to take lots of pictures and capture the memories of the special day.

instruction: Generate instructions for how to write a speech
output:
1. Understand the purpose of the speech and the audience - determine the message you want your audience to take away. 
2. Brainstorm ideas and structure the speech - determine a clear beginning, middle, and end to your speech. 
3. Research, develop, and organize the content - include data and quotes to support your ideas.
4. Identify any visuals and prepare the slides - determine how the visuals will help you convey your message. 
5. Create the first draft of the speech - write out the actual words of your speech. 
6. Revise the speech - this could include making changes in structure and grammar. 
7. Practice the speech - rehearse your speech to gain familiarity and improve pronunciation. 
8. Deliver the speech - speak confidently and look people in the eye while addressing them.

instruction: Generate a professional bio
output: Jane Smith is a professional software engineer with expertise in web development and machine learning. She has worked on projects for a range of clients including small businesses, government agencies and Fortune 500 companies. She has a passion for creating quality products and loves to stay up to date with the latest technologies. Jane is dedicated to her craft and strives to use her skills to benefit her clients and colleagues. She believes in the power of collaboration and enjoys working as part of diverse teams.

instruction: Generate a story according to this setting.
input: A bakery in the middle of a forest.
output: Once upon a time, deep in the heart of the forest, there was a small bakery that had been passed down through the generations. Despite its hidden location, the bakery always seemed quite busy and people came from far and wide to savor its delicious treats. The bakery was renowned far and wide for being a place of wonder; its pastries were nothing short of magical. Every morning, the exotic scents of sweet and savory cakes and pastries filled the air. Not a single soul who ever ventured into the bakery went home disappointed.

instruction: Compose a sonnet based on the sun.
output:
The sun rules with secret splendor,
A solace warm and clear,
The Maker’s hand unceasingly sought
To shower us all with cheer.

Giving all its fire and light,
A presence all around,
Its brilliance graces day and night
And all its shadows found.

Though storms and clouds may darken view,
The sun will not be moved,
Its steadfast strength and hopeful truth
Gives us life, duly proved.

What gratitude this gift us won, 
That we can ever bask,
The sun is the guiding force of life,
Though time shall eras pass.

instruction: Write a short thriller story.
output:
It was dark, the kind of darkness that incapacitates even the most experienced outdoorsman. But for Mike, it wasn’t just the darkness that was troublesome. He could hear something in the woods – something that sent shivers down his spine and made him paranoid of every step he took. He had been hunting in this forest for years, and yet he had never felt so scared and so alone. 

Suddenly he heard a twig snap to his left. His heart racing, Mike slowly began to back away in the direction of the car. Footsteps grew louder and closer, sending his body into a panic. He turned and ran, only to be stopped suddenly by a figure clad in black. The figure raised a gun pointed directly at Mike, and coldly said “you shouldn’t have come here.”

instruction: Given a dataset, find the average age.
input:
Dataset containing 5 people:
Person 1: Age 12
Person 2: Age 15
Person 3: Age 18
Person 4: Age 21
Person 5: Age 25
output: The average age is 18.

instruction: Create a new product for a given company.
output: Nike could create a new shoe designed specifically for high-intensity workouts. The shoe would be lightweight, responsive, and breathable, helping athletes to focus more on their workouts than on their feet. It would also feature advanced cushioning technology to cushion hard landings, as well as an internal lacing system to keep feet locked in place and prevent slipping.

instruction: Identify the best candidate for a given job.
input:
Candidates for the position of content writer:

Person 1: 4 years experience, two samples of published content
Person 2: 6 years experience, four samples of published content
Person 3: 10 years experience, five samples of published content
output: Person 3 is the best candidate for the position of content writer. With 10 years of experience and five samples of published content, Person 3 has the best qualifications for the job.

instruction: Describe the best way to conduct an interview.
output: The best way to conduct an interview is to create an environment that is comfortable and welcoming for the candidate. A successful interview should be an engaging conversation, rather than a one-sided interrogation. Questions should be tailored specifically to the role and you should give the candidate enough time to answer. Additionally, it's important to listen to the candidate's answers and provide constructive feedback when needed.

instruction: Describe the main character of the given story in two sentences.
input: Once upon a time, there was an old man who had three sons.
output: The old man was kind-hearted and wise, and he had great faith in his three sons. He taught each of them important lessons that would help shape their futures.

instruction: Answer the given math equation.

output:

Group 2: 7, 9

instruction: Determine if the sentiment of a given tweet is positive, negative or neutral.
input: I love playing guitar and exploring the great outdoors!
output: positive

instruction: Read the followingwiki article and provide a short summary.
output: The Ford Mustang is an American car manufactured by Ford Motor Company. It was first released in 1964 and has since become a symbol of American muscle cars. Its classic design has been updated over the years and today the Mustang stands alone as a model of modern performance and style. It is currently offered in several models with various engine and trim options, allowing buyers to customize the Mustang to their own preferences.

instruction: Compare the two items and provide an opinion.
output: Both apples and oranges are great sources of Vitamin C and other nutrients, but apples tends to be a bit more tart in taste, while oranges are more sweet.

instruction: Compose a tweet of length 140 characters or less in response to the following:
input: How do you stay motivated during difficult times?
output: I stay motivated by focusing on what I can do instead of what I can't. Taking baby steps and celebrating the small successes helps to keep me going! #motivation #stayingpositive
